description.translate: Forgive, we shall not.	Forget, we shall not.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Dimmu Borgir\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Nous ne pardonnerons pas.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Nous n'oublierons pas.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Forgive, we shall not.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Forget, we shall not.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HAS§a4 §7HER§c-1\"}"]}}
